input.rewritten_query: 查询22级计算机科学与技术专业一班男生人数

sql_result.sql: WITH base AS (SELECT student.id FROM student JOIN class ON student.class_id = class.id JOIN major ON class.major_id = major.id WHERE class.grade_year = 2022 AND major.major_name = '计算机科学与技术' AND class.class_name = '一班' AND student.gender = '男' AND student.is_deleted = 0 AND class.is_deleted = 0 AND major.is_deleted = 0) SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM base

entity_mappings.reason: 根据字段描述“年级/入学年份（如 2022 级）”映射，22级对应入学年份2022
根据字段描述“专业名称，专业实体映射主字段”直接匹配
根据字段描述“班级名称，班级实体映射主字段”直接匹配
根据字段描述“性别（男/女等）”，归一化为标准值'男'

sql_validate_result.executed_sql: WITH base AS (SELECT student.id FROM student JOIN class ON student.class_id = class.id JOIN major ON class.major_id = major.id WHERE class.grade_year = 2022 AND major.major_name = '计算机科学与技术' AND class.class_name = '一班' AND student.gender = '男' AND student.is_deleted = 0 AND class.is_deleted = 0 AND major.is_deleted = 0) SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM base
